model

Class Tileset

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Tileset

  • public class Tileset
extends java.util.Observable
    Class that represents a tileset to be used in map creation. Contains all necessary informations to store, visualize and use a tileset in order to design a 2D map
    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Pedro Sampaio

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tileset

        public Tileset(java.lang.String name,
               int tileSize,
               java.awt.Image image,
               java.lang.String imagePath,
               int firstID)
        Class constructor
        Parameters:
        name - desired name for the tileset
        tileSize - desired tile size for the tileset
        image - desired image for the tileset
        imagePath - the path of the image
        firstID - the id(global - for all tilesets) of the first tile in the tileset

      • Tileset

        public Tileset(java.lang.String name,
               int tileSize,
               java.awt.Image image,
               java.lang.String imagePath,
               int firstID,
               int tilecount)
        Class constructor Receives all informations for cases of tileset loaded from save file
        Parameters:
        name - desired name for the tileset
        tileSize - desired tile size for the tileset
        image - desired image for the tileset
        imagePath - the path of the image
        firstID - the id(global - for all tilesets) of the first tile in the tileset
        tilecount - the number of tiles that exists in the tileset
